ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ministry of Defence, Ships, Communications and Situational Awareness (CSA)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Defence, Ships, Communications and Situational Awareness (CSA)
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Ministry of Defence, Ships Communications and Situational Awareness (CSA), Ash 1c # 3114 MOD Abbey Wood, Filton

SHORT_DESCR.P: Meridian units and ancillaries procured to address OPDEFS shortage in stores.
Purchase of meridian units and ancillaries to address OPDEFS.

D_JUSTIFICATION.P: The United Kingdom Ministry of Defence (the ‘Authority’) intends to place a new procurement contract with Teledyne TSS Ltd (the ‘Company’) to support Meridian and SGB 2000 gyrocompasses. For the procurement of meridian gyro compass units and ancillary equipment. The contract will provide Meridian units and ancillary equipment to address outstanding OPDEFS demands and to replenish stores with equipment demands to mitigate capability risks.

(a) the Company is the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) of the equipment. The service required by the Authority (including repairs and maintenance) can only be performed by the company because only they hold the technical information and know how necessary to perform the service. The contract cannot be performed without access to that information. Furthermore, no licences have been granted to another other party, including the Authority, to obtain the technical manuals, as such only the Company is the only supplier capable of providing the required equipment support to the existing systems;

(b) a platform’s gyrocompass is a ship’s safety system and requires a significant amount of interoperability with the rest of the systems. Without access to the technical and confidential information held by the company no other company would be able to ensure the required levels interoperability for this system. Only the company, as the technical authority and system designer, have the technical information and know-how necessary for ensuring the safety of the system;

(c) additionally, the Company has designed and developed their own equipment build, test and repair facilities which are required for the performance of this contract. No other company has access to these facilities and they are necessary for the performance of this contract;
(d) it is considered that only the company has the technical expertise at its disposal, including the know-how and system specifications to support the meridian and SGB2000 gyrocompasses.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: Teledyne Marine, International avenue, ABZ Business Park, Dyce

INFO_ADD.P: The Authority reserves the right to amend any condition related to security of information to reflect any changes in national law or government policy. If any contract documents are accompanied by instructions on safeguarding classified information (e.g. a security aspects letter), the Authority reserves the right to amend the terms of these instructions to reflect any changes in national law or government policy, whether in respect of the applicable protective marking scheme, specific protective markings given, the aspects to which any protective marking applies, or otherwise. The link below to the Gov.uk website provides information on the Government Security Classification.

Advertising Regime OJEU: this contract opportunity is published in the Official Journal of the European Union (OJEU), the MoD Defence Contracts Bulletin and www.contracts.mod.uk GO Reference: GO-2019520-DCB-14912675
